"Welmina": "Ah, you must be the new Meteorn. Looks like you've just arrived, in fact!"
"Hmm... Once you get a bit stronger, come and see me!"
"Oh, hi there! I'm Welmina, of the ARKS Beast Master division."
"...Ah, you must think I'm rather childish for an instructor. I'll have you know that I have many faithful students, thank you very much!"
"Anyways, moving on. I've been hearing quite a bit about you. You've gotten so much stronger in such a short time."
"If you're interested in how Wakers fight, I have much to teach you. Why, you could even call me your teacher if you'd like!"
"Have you been keeping up with your training?"
"Continue to foster healthy teamwork with your Familiars!"
"Aw, okayyy. Come back soon, okay? I mean it!"
"Help your Familiars so that they can help you!"
